junkville/intendant.ask-about-scavengers: Hey ! I found a group of scavengers stuck in the tunnels below the junkyard !
junkville/intendant.ask-ramsom-for-missing-scavengers: C'est pour des fouilleurs disparus. Je les ai trouvés, mais ils sont tenus captifs par des chiens à diamant. Ils exigent des soins en échange.
junkville/intendant.ask-ransom-for-missing-scavengers-with-c: C'est pour les fouilleurs disparus. Ils sont vivants, mais tenus captis. Raggedy Randy pense qu'il faut payer la rançon.
junkville/intendant.ask-scavenger-ransom: I need supplies. A medical kit and 5 health potions. Can you help ?
junkville/intendant.give-rathian-parts: Hey, I've got the parts you wanted from Rathian's.
junkville/intendant.on-give-rathian-parts:
Awesome ! It's crazy how well they're preserved. These "scribe" sure know their craft.

Thanks for the help !
junkville/intendant.rathian-parts-accept-quest: Sure, I'll see what I can do.
junkville/intendant.rathian-parts-ask-about-scavengers: So, are you going to provide the medical supplies to help the scavengers ?
junkville/intendant.rathian-parts-quest:
Hey, wait just a moment, will you ? I heard you've been helping people around here, and I was wondering if you could help me as well ?

Rathian, who lives in the workshop in front of here, has entire crate of electronical devices… but we can't get him to share these resources. A Steel Ranger thing, probably, they don't like sharing tech.

If you get me a crate of electronical devices, I'll give you a dsicount on my merchs.
junkville/intendant.rathian-parts-reject-quest: I'm not everpony's delivery worker, find somepony else.
junkville/intendant.scavenger-negociate-accept: Of course… what do you want ?
junkville/intendant.scavenger-negociate-give-up: Forget about it, I'm just gonna handle this myself.
junkville/intendant.scavenger-sub-quest-accept: I'll see what I can do.
junkville/intendant.scavenger-sub-quest-already-done: I think I already have the parts you're looking for. [Give her the components you found at Rathian's]
junkville/intendant.scavengers-negociate-insist: Lives are at stake, Facade. If we wait to long, there won't be anything to negociate anymore, except a bunch of dead bodies.
junkville/intendant.scavengers/accept-ransom: Ok. I won't argue. But it's a huge blow on our stocks, you know ? I sure hope we'll get something out of it.
junkville/intendant.scavengers/cannot-accept-ransom:
She goes through her inventory, and looks up to you, visibly annoyed:

I'd like to help, but I don't have what you're asking for. I'm sorry… I guess we have no choice but to let them die… fuck.
junkville/intendant.scavengers/negociate: Okay. This is going to seriously mess up our stocks though… we might need these supplies soon, and I'll have a hard time replenishing. I'm not going to let people die. But I want something in return.
junkville/intendant.scavengers/ransom-entry: I see. You either intend on surviving something stupid, or you need to save somepony who failed to do so. What are you up to ?
junkville/intendant.scavengers/sub-quest:
The scavengers are important, but I can't risk sacrificing our resources without some kind of warranty. I will need to resupply.

And I know how to do it. Rathian, who lives in the workshop in front of here, has entire crate of electronical devices… but we can't get him to share these resources. A Steel Ranger thing, probably, they don't like sharing tech.

If you get me a crate of electronical devices, I will be able to sell it to the caraveneers, and buy back the supplies the diamond dogs want from us.
junkville/intendant.scavengers/sub-quest-instant-solve#2:
Of course, take the medical supplies you needed.

She gives you everything you asked for.
junkville/intendant.scavengers/towards-cook: Missing scavengers ? Holy crap. You should bring that up to Raggedy Randy. He's at the inn, he's been worried sick about them !
